title: The Romance of Regency: A Series Starter Collection
description:
Fall in love with this sweeping Regency Historical Romance collection from seven of your very favorite Dragonblade authors!Lose yourself in seven beautifully told Regency tales. From damaged dukes to exiled rogues to second chances in love, enjoy romance as only the Regency period can deliver.Included in this collection:
 Duke of Depravity
 by Scarlett Scott
 How to Wake a Sleeping Lady
 by Bree Wolf
 Duke of Knight
 by Elizabeth Johns
 A Rogue to Remember
 by Chasity Bowlin
 The Look of Love
 by Meara Platt
 The Deserted Heart
 by Mary LancasterBonus Book: 
 Emma
 by Kathryn Le Veque
author: Scarlett Scott
